decks.notes: The main focus of this Doomsday combo deck is to efficiently use various mana acceleration spells and card selection effects to assemble a lethal combo, typically involving Doomsday, Thassa's Oracle, and a way to draw cards. The goal is to set up a game-winning situation in a single turn, utilizing powerful spells like Dark Ritual and Lotus Petal to generate mana, while also having protection in the form of Force of Will and Daze to ensure the combo's success. The deck is designed to quickly and effectively execute its combo strategy while disrupting opponents' plans.

This deck focuses on utilizing the combo of Painter's Servant and Grindstone to mill the opponent's entire library. It also includes disruptive elements like Pyroblast and Red Elemental Blast to control the game while setting up the combo. The deck also features cards like Urza's Saga and Goblin Engineer to tutor for key pieces and maintain board presence. Additionally, cards like Fable of the Mirror-Breaker provide alternate win conditions. The deck aims to efficiently disrupt and combo off to overwhelm opponents in Legacy 1 vs 1 matches.

The main concept of this deck is to disrupt the opponent's mana base using cards like Magus of the Moon and Blood Moon, while deploying aggressive threats like Broadside Bombardiers and Pyrogoyf to quickly close out the game. The deck also utilizes powerful artifacts like The One Ring and Chalice of the Void to control the board and protect its own creatures. With a focus on fast mana acceleration and punishing opponents' non-basic lands, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of resource denial and aggressive creatures.

The main focus of this Legacy Dragon Stompy deck is to lock down opponents with powerful disruptive cards like Blood Moon, Magus of the Moon, and Chalice of the Void, while also having a strong aggressive approach with creatures like Pyrogoyf and Broadside Bombardiers. By utilizing acceleration from cards like Chrome Mox and Simian Spirit Guide, this deck aims to quickly establish board presence and pressure opponents into making unfavorable decisions. Additionally, the inclusion of removal spells like Fury and Sundering Eruption help maintain control of the battlefield and ensure a smooth path to victory.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly drop low-cost creatures like Delver of Secrets and Dragon's Rage Channeler, while disrupting the opponent's game plan with spells like Daze and Force of Will. Cards like Murktide Regent and Lightning Bolt provide additional aggressive options to close out the game. Mishra's Bauble and Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student help with card advantage and setting up future plays. The mana base is streamlined with fetch lands and dual lands, allowing for consistent color access. Overall, the strategy is to apply pressure early and control the game tempo to secure a victory.

This deck focuses on utilizing Ninjas like Yuriko, the Tiger's Shadow and Ingenious Infiltrator to deal damage and disrupt the opponent's strategy. It also includes cards like Baleful Strix and Kaito, Bane of Nightmares to control the board and protect key creatures. The deck utilizes a combination of quick, cheap spells like Daze and Force of Will to control the game early on, while also having removal options like Murderous Cut and Fatal Push. Overall, the deck aims to be aggressive and disruptive, using Ninjas to control the pace of the game.
